select /* 시료별 검사결과 조회 : 검사항목 Header 조회 [ProcessSmpInspRstListMapper.getProcessSmpInspRstListHeader] CreatedBy 김범수*/ r.insp_item_cd ,i.insp_item_nm ,min(ii.sort_no) as sort_no from tbl_qm_insp_mast m , tbl_qm_insp_dtl d , tbl_qm_insp_rst r , tbl_qm_insp_item i , tbl_qm_smp_insp_item ii where m.prdtn_corp_id = d.prdtn_corp_id and m.fac_id = d.fac_id and m.insp_reg_no = d.insp_reg_no and d.prdtn_corp_id = r.prdtn_corp_id and d.fac_id = r.fac_id and d.insp_reg_no = r.insp_reg_no and d.insp_smp_no = r.insp_smp_no and r.prdtn_corp_id = i.prdtn_corp_id and r.fac_id = i.fac_id and r.insp_item_cd = i.insp_item_cd and d.prdtn_corp_id = ii.prdtn_corp_id and d.fac_id = ii.fac_id and d.smp_cd = ii.smp_cd and r.insp_item_cd = ii.insp_item_cd and ii.activ_yn = 'Y' --and ii.report_use_yn = 'Y' /*일보사용여부*/ and m.prdtn_corp_id = #{prdtnCorpId} and m.fac_id = #{facId} and m.smp_insp_tp_cd in ('0401','0301') /*검사구분[0102:수입,0401:물성,0402:외관,0301:공정중검사]*/ and d.insp_dtl_status= 'C' /*진행상태[C:판정확정]*/ and m.insp_tp_cd = #{inspTpCd} -- 검사구분 and m.smp_tp_cd = #{smpTpCd} -- 시료유형 and m.smp_grp_cd = #{smpGrpCd} -- 시료그룹 and r.insp_dt between nvl(#{inspDtFr},'00010101') and nvl(#{inspDtTo},'99991231') /*검사일자*/
and d.smp_cd = #{smpCd} -- 시료
group by r.insp_item_cd,i.insp_item_nm order by sort_no,r.insp_item_cd

/* 시료별 검사결과 조회 : 시료별 검사결과 조회 [ProcessSmpInspRstListMapper.getProcessSmpInspRstList] CreatedBy 김범수*/ with smp_mgmt as ( /*시료관리*/ select * from tbl_qm_smp_mgmt where use_yn = 'Y' /*사용여부*/ and smp_insp_tp_cd in ('0401','0301') /*검사구분[0102:수입,0401:물성,0402:외관,0301:공정중검사]*/ and prdtn_corp_id = #{prdtnCorpId} /*법인ID*/ and fac_id = #{facId} /*공장ID*/ ), sm_t as ( /*시료유형*/ select * from smp_mgmt where data_tp_cd = 'SMP_TYPE' ), sm_g as ( /*시료그룹*/ select * from smp_mgmt where data_tp_cd = 'SMP_GROUP' ), sm_i as ( /*시료*/ select * from smp_mgmt where data_tp_cd = 'SMP_ITEM' ), cmm_cd as ( /*공통코드*/ select * from tbl_cmm_cd where prdtn_corp_id = #{prdtnCorpId} /*법인ID*/ and use_yn = 'Y' /*사용여부*/ ), cit as ( /*검사구분*/ select * from cmm_cd where cd_tp_id = 'INSP_TP' ), insp as ( select m.prdtn_corp_id ,m.fac_id ,m.insp_tp_cd ,m.smp_tp_cd ,m.smp_grp_cd ,d.smp_cd ,d.lot_no ,d.prdtn_dt ,r.insp_dt
,(case when r.insp_item_cd = #{item} then nvl(r.rst_val,null) else null end)::numeric as "${item}" ,(case when r.insp_item_cd = #{item} then nvl(ii.ship_spec_min,null) else null end)::numeric as "${item}_min" ,(case when r.insp_item_cd = #{item} then nvl(ii.ship_spec_max,null) else null end)::numeric as "${item}_max"
from tbl_qm_insp_mast m , tbl_qm_insp_dtl d , tbl_qm_insp_rst r , tbl_qm_smp_insp_item ii where m.prdtn_corp_id = d.prdtn_corp_id and m.fac_id = d.fac_id and m.insp_reg_no = d.insp_reg_no and d.prdtn_corp_id = r.prdtn_corp_id and d.fac_id = r.fac_id and d.insp_reg_no = r.insp_reg_no and d.insp_smp_no = r.insp_smp_no and d.prdtn_corp_id = ii.prdtn_corp_id and d.fac_id = ii.fac_id and d.smp_cd = ii.smp_cd and r.insp_item_cd = ii.insp_item_cd and ii.activ_yn = 'Y' --and ii.report_use_yn = 'Y' /*일보사용여부*/ and m.prdtn_corp_id = #{prdtnCorpId} and m.fac_id = #{facId} and m.smp_insp_tp_cd in ('0401','0301') /*검사구분[0102:수입,0401:물성,0402:외관,0301:공정중검사]*/ and d.insp_dtl_status= 'C' /*진행상태[C:판정확정]*/ and m.insp_tp_cd = #{inspTpCd} -- 검사구분 and m.smp_tp_cd = #{smpTpCd} -- 시료유형 and m.smp_grp_cd = #{smpGrpCd} -- 시료그룹 and r.insp_dt between nvl(#{inspDtFr},'00010101') and nvl(#{inspDtTo},'99991231') /*검사일자*/
and d.smp_cd = #{smpCd} -- 시료
) select prdtn_corp_id as "prdtnCorpId" ,fac_id as "facId" ,insp_tp_cd as "inspTpCd" ,smp_tp_cd as "smpTpCd" ,smp_grp_cd as "smpGrpCd" ,smp_cd as "smpCd" ,lot_no as "lotNo" ,to_char(to_date(nvl(prdtn_dt,null)),'yyyy-mm-dd') as "prdtnDt" ,to_char(to_date(nvl(insp_dt,null)),'yyyy-mm-dd') as "inspDt" ,(select smp_nm from sm_t st where st.smp_cd = a.smp_tp_cd) as "smpTpNm" /*시료유형명*/ ,(select smp_nm from sm_g sg where sg.smp_cd = a.smp_grp_cd) as "smpGrpNm" /*시료그룹명*/ ,(select smp_nm from sm_i si where si.smp_cd = a.smp_cd) as "smpNm" /*시료명*/ ,(select cd_val_kr_nm from cit where cit.cd_val = a.insp_tp_cd) as "inspTpNm" /*검사구분명*/
,fnc_insp_item_round_num(prdtn_corp_id,fac_id,#{item},avg("${item}")) as "${item}"
from insp a group by prdtn_corp_id ,fac_id ,insp_tp_cd ,smp_tp_cd ,smp_grp_cd ,smp_cd ,lot_no ,prdtn_dt ,insp_dt
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'1',null,null,null ,'N수' /*검사구분명*/
,count("${item}")
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'2',null,null,null ,'Avg' /*검사구분명*/
,fnc_insp_item_round_num(max(prdtn_corp_id), max(fac_id), #{item}, avg("${item}"))
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'3',null,null,null ,'Max' /*검사구분명*/
,max("${item}")
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'4',null,null,null ,'Min' /*검사구분명*/
,min("${item}")
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'5',null,null,null ,'R' /*검사구분명*/
,max("${item}")-min("${item}")
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'6',null,null,null ,'CV%' /*검사구분명*/
,pkg_qms_formula.fnc_get_cv(stddev("${item}"),avg("${item}"))
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'7',null,null,null ,'Sigma' /*검사구분명*/
,fnc_insp_item_round_num(max(prdtn_corp_id),max(fac_id),#{item},stddev("${item}"))
from insp
union all select null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,'8',null,null,null ,'Cpk' /*검사구분명*/
,pkg_qms_formula.fnc_get_cpk(max("${item}_min"),max("${item}_max"),stddev("${item}"),avg("${item}"))
from insp
order by "inspTpCd","smpTpCd","smpGrpCd","smpCd","lotNo","prdtnDt","inspDt"
